title: Tech News: Twitter Deals, Whistleblowers, and National Security, Oh My!
itunes:title: Tech News: Twitter Deals, Whistleblowers, and National Security, Oh My!
description:
Twitter shareholders voted to approve Elon Musk's acquisition bid for Twitter even as a whistleblower testified in front of Congress that Twitter has terrible security practices. Plus Senators put social media in the hot seat, California sues Amazon and EA's anti-cheat strategy is scary. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Twitter shareholders voted to approve Elon Musk's acquisition bid for Twitter even as a whistleblower testified in front of Congress that Twitter has terrible security practices. Plus Senators put social media in the hot seat, California sues Amazon and EA's anti-cheat strategy is scary. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Amazon, Meta, Google, YouTube, TikTok, Twitter, Elon Musk, whistleblower, security, privacy, surveillance, anti-competitive, monopoly, EA, Electronic Arts, cheating, kernel
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
